INTRO_TEXT: Soon you will be able to browse the marketplace in your area and post your own listings for free. Click the button to learn more.
START_TEXT: You are just one step away from shopping in the local marketplace.
AGREE_TO: By signing up you agree to our
PASSWORD_MINLENGTH: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
WHICH_COUNTRY: Which country is your business located in?
TITLE: Title
FOLLOW_LEGAL_TERMS: I will follow all legal procedures while using this app.
THINGS_TO_KNOW_TEXT:
• Make sure that their premises are ventilated at least 5 times a day.
• Workers must be supplied with personal hygiene products (soal, paper towels, towels, hand disinfection products) and make sure they are supplied regularly.
• Make sure that premise surfaces (tables, chairs, windowsills) are wet-cleaned once a day.
• Make sure that premise toilets and their door handles are disinfected at lest five times a day.
 • Inform their workers about hygiene regulations in commonly visited and visible places (example entrance/exit handling).
WHAT_KIND: What kind of items do you offer?
RECOVER_PASSWORD_TEXT: Please enter your email address and we'll send you an link to reset your password.
